titles.title: Angels From The Realms Of Glory

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Angels from the realms of glory, newline Wing your flight o'er all the earth; newline Ye who sang creation's story, newline Now proclaim Messiah's birth. newline Come and worship, come and worship; newline Worship Christ, the new-born King!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Shepherds in the fields abiding, newline Watching o'er your flocks by night; newline God with man is now residing, newline Yonder shines the infant Light. newline Come and worship, come and worship; newline Worship Christ, the new-born King!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Sages, leave your contemplation's, newline Brighter visions beam afar; newline Seek the great Desire of nations, newline Ye have seen His natal star. newline Come and worship, come and worship; newline Worship Christ, the new-born King!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Saints, before the altar bending, newline Watching long in hope and fear; newline Suddenly the Lord, descending, newline In His temple shall appear. newline Come and worship, come and worship; newline Worship Christ, the new-born King!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: All creation, join in praising, newline God, the Father, Spirit, Son; newline Evermore your voices raising, newline To the eternal Three in One. newline Come and worship, come and worship; newline Worship Christ, the new-born King!
